author: Joseph Zucker
title: Premier League Players Create 'Players Together' Campaign for COVID-19 Relief
description: Players from the Premier League have launched the #PlayersTogether campaign to help the National Health Service with its COVID-19 treatment and relief efforts...
content:
Catherine Ivill/Getty Images
Players from the Premier League have launched the #PlayersTogether campaign to help the National Health Service with its COVID-19 treatment and relief efforts. 
The statement read:
